name: get_locations
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool septa.
Tool description: Provides hackathon-style access to the SEPTA API.

Allows introspection of the SEPTA locations and routes, and provides basically-realtime data on delays, alerts, vehicles, and routes.
API description: Fetches geographical locations within a specified radius of the given longitude and latitude coordinates, optionally filtered by type.

lon.description: Longitude coordinate of the center point.

lat.description: Latitude coordinate of the center point.

radius.description: Radius in miles from the center point within which to search for locations. Defaults to 3.

type.description: Type of locations to filter; one of ['bus_stops', 'rail_stations', 'perk_locations', 'trolley_stops', 'sales_locations']. Defaults to None.
